    • Method Detail

      • addOrUpdateAssetCollection

        public AssetCollectionResponse addOrUpdateAssetCollection(Long accountId,
                                                 String collectionType,
                                                 Long collectionId,
                                                 String title,
                                                 Long coverAssetId,
                                                 Long startDate,
                                                 Long endDate,
                                                 List<String> tags,
                                                 String description,
                                                 Boolean publicRead,
                                                 Boolean publicWrite,
                                                 Boolean publicDelete,
                                                 Boolean publicAdd,
                                                 String locationDescription,
                                                 Enums.Visibility visibility,
                                                 Location location)
                                                   throws SirqulException
        Adds or Updates an asset collection. If the "collectionId" parameter is false, this will create a new AssetCollection. If "collectionId" is a valid id, this will update that collection.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/collection
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        collectionType - the collection type
        collectionId - the collection id
        title - the title
        coverAssetId - the cover asset id
        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date
        tags - the tags
        description - the description
        publicRead - the public read
        publicWrite - the public write
        publicDelete - the public delete
        publicAdd - the public add
        locationDescription - the location description
        visibility - the visibility
        location - the location
        Returns:
        a AssetCollectionResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getAssetCollection

        public AssetCollectionResponse getAssetCollection(Long accountId,
                                         Long collectionId,
                                         Location location)
                                           throws SirqulException
        Gets the asset collection.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/collection/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        collectionId - the collection id
        location - the location
        Returns:
        a AssetCollectionResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchAssetCollections

        public AssetCollectionListResponse searchAssetCollections(Long accountId,
                                                 String appId,
                                                 String collectionType,
                                                 Long ownerId,
                                                 String keyword,
                                                 List<Enums.Ownership> filters,
                                                 Enums.AssetCollectionApiMap sortField,
                                                 Boolean descending,
                                                 Integer start,
                                                 Integer limit,
                                                 Long dateCreated,
                                                 Location location)
                                                   throws SirqulException
        Search asset collections.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/collection/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        appId - the app id
        collectionType - the collection type
        ownerId - the owner id
        keyword - the keyword
        filters - the filters
        sortField - the sort field
        descending - determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - the start
        limit - the limit
        dateCreated - the date created
        location - the location
        Returns:
        a AssetCollectionListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
